mapper.select: SELECT reservation_code AS reservationCode, reservation_status AS reservationStatus, checkin_date AS checkinDate, checkout_date AS checkoutDate, guest_count AS guestCount, guest_type AS guestType, reservation_channel AS reservationChannel, reserved_at AS reservedAt, tenant_code AS tenantCode, room_code AS roomCode, customer_id AS customerId FROM reservation ORDER BY reservation_code DESC
